name: Euro Fishing
description: Euro Fishing immerses you deep into the adrenaline-packed action, fun and beauty of Europe’s most famous lakes. Master your rod, line and tactics, and refine your technique to become a top angler. This is the closest you can get to real fishing from the comfort of your own couch.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit Processor: Quad-Core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card with 1 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 460 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

reviews.review_text: It's a good game so far. However I have issues with it calculating the correct weights during tournaments. At other times the controls don't work as they should.

I'm really enjoying this game thus far and I think many people will agree, although there have been a few teething issues, this game has huge potential.  This game does focus on a European style of Fishing, this is bait fishing! Personally I think it's far more tactical then lore or fly fishing.  Overall, this is a great start and I'm excited to see how the game develops from here!

***Edit*** Developer stayed in touch which makes me feel kinda good and gives me a sense that this is going very serious and they are trying to make it good, they explained me that this will not be a win to play game. Its on very early stage and by helping us funding them we (in the future) will have the complete game. anyway ... Seeing the developer in touch, this somehow makes me want to give them a vote of confidence. GL.
after some bad updates and long waitings this game has become enjoyable again :)

Pleasant contemplative game which continues to improve. Good for a relaxing break from hardcore action and strategy games. I play it while listening to the news to unwind. Solid multiplayer experience. They really should introduce a 4 pack to make it easier to start playing with friends.

Not bad at all this. Great fun to play with others on line. Casting is a bit hit and miss ,but you eventually get the the hang of it. I use an XBOX controller and I'd love to see a vibration mode in a future update. Overall it's good but it does require a powerful system to run it with high quality setting. I had to drop the resolution to 1280×720 to make it more playable with medium quality which makes for more successful casting
best fishing game ever

This was already a good game but the float fishing update and being able to customise my kit has taken it to a whole new level! Loads of new game play and ways of fishing! This game has so much potential.
the sound of the drag when the fish takes line is gone in digger lake, otherwise i think it is a good game
FIRST CLASS. WOULD RECOMMEND TO ALL AND SUNDRY. WELL DONE.  REGARDS
I keep getting fatal error in favourite fishing hole. Catch a few, and some larger ones, then goes on the blimey. Every time now.

I have no idea why people are giving this game a bad review. Players are saying that the controls are whack but I just dont see it. Its supposed to be challenging and just one of those things that you have to master before you throw a perfect cast every time. I even found reeling in the fish was a nice challenge also (for me) but others may not think its hard and just pick it up fast. The only thing I have seen in the negative reviews that I agreed with is the textures and water quality but im running the game on ultra so it didnt bother me. The other presets though are kinda ugly but not ugly enough to give the game a negative review. I am a carp fisherman in real life and this game represents that well. The game is very fun and addicting but definantly not worth 25 bucks with the amount of content but if you get this on sale right now its worth it. If you are a fisherman this game is a must have. Hope this review helps people that cant decide whether or not to buy
Great game, great graphics i like it and i recommend this game to be played and I'm hoping for future great updates.
this is a must game for anyone who likes fishing
no kids yelling out about having sex with my mom , just me hooking fish. 10 out 10
hi, why i just choose a character and when i key in the name, is was black screen~! is it bug? please fix it~ i havent start to play yet. thanks.

I previously had a big issue with this game to do with the casting, and left bad review, however the casting is now fixed and it has completely refresehed the game, very enjoyable and relaxing. It's great that community issues are being responded to.

I was not able to play this game at all. I use a three monitors on PC system and this does not support that. There is no way to manually change the resolution.  I read a post message asking why there was no support for 3 monitors and the response was ' Because We Don't Have 3 Heads'. I will not support a company that treats it's customer base like dog waste and this represents a company that only wants the peoples money and when it have it, push their nose in a pile of sand! I'm want my money back I have shut down two monitors and with it running on the one monitor it locks up! I try to run this for 62 minutes.

Not bad game however there are a lot of bugs to the point that you almost wish you could use them as bait. Everytime ive had a good fish on game just falls on it face not cool. Graphics are pretty nice and the methods are spot on. This game's biggest problem though with the bugs its just not worth the cash and you have fishing planet which is free but a bit of a grind its also more geared towards novice anglers. Hope this review helped.

Fishing. I love it all my life. It was the only thing my Father and I did together as I grew up. My dad was a student of fishing. By that I mean, he tied flies, he read, etc. I started fishing in England. Catching Roach, and other river, stream, fish.  This game doesn't remind me much of my fishing experiences through life. I live on the shores of Georgian Bay, Ontario. Muskoka region, and all around there are a huge divesity of fish here in Wasaga Beach. Sturgeon in the Nottawasaga, rainbow trout runs up the river from Bay. Salmon, carp, catfish, brook trout, brown trout.  What I'm saying is a title with 'simulation' in it, should at least try to be realistic.  Its a sterile, boring, bland, and not realistic to my fishing days. I'm not saying the 'type' of fishing is what I don't like, its the game play, that's way off.   I wasn't hoping for much more, but this is taking bare bones a bit too far. If this is the only type of fishing you Europeans can do, save up and come to Canada. You will then feell like you've really fished. And see again how far off this 'Simulation' is.  Graphics ...bland, weak colours, water is from circa 2005. No underwater shots, to see the fish use its particular abilities to throw the hook and run with the bail screaming on your reel. The sense of weight, the feel like you are working something toward you, careful guiding it around obstacles , lowering rod tip when you think the Fish is about to jump.  Basic stuff . But not even that. All you have to do, is basically Horse the fish in. No light tackle option to really use skill in playing a fish in  I can't recommend this game to anyone, Its just a shell of a game. 5 perch out of 10. There are no fish in school in this game, they're all drop outs.
Black screen on startup... Game Stopped working .... not playable...

If you have useless time, don't spend it with this game. This need many improvements for fishing. More lures, baits and rods (even fishs).  I don't like style what this game shows 'just give some fishfood and catch a fish'. It almost like throw dynamite and collect results. It is morally wrong when we talk real hunting/fishing.  I know this is just a game but hope simulation tag will removed from this game. Simulation should base real life and good hunting recommendations.
casting is near impossible, as the mouse is not releasing as you want it to. the sooner this game has a powerbar style cast and angle release the better.
I would compare this game to Fishing Planet. FIshing Planet is great, but it is also free, whereas Euro Fishing is $25 bucks.

DONT BUY PEOPLE this game is rubbish dont load properly and the support is totally rubbish from steam i paid £14.99 tried to set it all up took me two hours and still didnt run so dont be fooled in buying this oh and to top it of they dont give REFUNDS so the company is not good at all they have been reported for being unfair and for not being reasonable there is a tabloid in print and this firm are in there as no 1   SIMPLY DONT BUY FROM THEM ive been treated UNFAIR    see you in court STEAM

This game was being pushed out at the Northern Angling Show the game you download is nothing like the one at the show. the controls are terrible, unless you have a super spec gaming computer most computers will struggle to run this, i had to have my graphics turned to low, and run the game in 4'' square windowed mode. casting is a complete nightmare, what a waste of £15. id like a refund

This is my 3rd review after the latest phase, better casting and graphically excellent, but still this does not make me want to play it, Maybe its me but i Still prefer the true cast as you get with all the trophy bass games, This game just does not grab me like other older games even the old Jack Chartons fishing game on the Cbm64 and gone fishing not graphically great but so playable i hardly put them down, This game has Great sound and graphics but game play for me just dont make me want to play it as it stands .Also i cannot say buy it or not i still put as not recommended at the moment but thats my own views . This phase 3 is the best so far and its going in the right direction
this is the worst fishing game ever i know casting is an art but it is not that hard stupid
as much as i like this game it ♥♥♥♥ me off so much i played 11 hours just for steam to delete my game lost all my boss fish points all rods as well as bait
if u wanna be cancer play DOTA 2 not this sh.t
